Articles.Content:
im finally starting in ksp 1.1 with more and badder mods. Im restarting my interstellar modded playthrough. in 1.0.5 which suffered severe lag

already one quarter in -.-

KCT configured for long build and research times to leave enough time for random missions!
"Darkstar"... I expect to see a planet or two destroyed during this series - and a bit of aero surfing
